Texas

Last Updated 6/4/20

State Wide Donation Links

Texas Organizing Project: Texas Organizing Project is bailing out protesters in Harris, Dallas, and Bexar Counties. All donations will go directly towards bailing people out!

Faith In Texas: Faith In Texas, a multi-racial, multi-faith grassroots movement of Texans working for economic, racial, and social justice is bailing out protesters.

The Fianza Fund: The Fianza Fund, an immigration bail fund, is currently raising bail funds for protesters

Black Owned Businesses: Support Black owned business owners in Texas.
